alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Crawford; Franklin; Madison; Sebastian; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 21 at 3:00AM CST until further notice by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Arkansas and west central Arkansas, including the following counties, in northwest Arkansas, Carroll, Crawford, Madison and Washington AR. In west central Arkansas, Franklin and Sebastian. * WHEN...Late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Widespread showers and thunderstorms will develop late tonight. Rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches with local amounts around 3 inches will be possible. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Crawford; Franklin; Madison; Sebastian; Washington
